item.title: 解决Error:fatal:No url found for submodule path 'public' in .gitmodules.使用github page部署失败。
item.author: 2446040095@qq.com (Goran)
item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204120301258.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="解决error-fatal-no-url-found-for-submodule-path-public-in-gitmodules使用github-page部署失败" class="heading-element"><span>解决Error: fatal: No url found for submodule path &lsquo;public&rsquo; in .gitmodules：使用github page部署失败。</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a7%a3%e5%86%b3error-fatal-no-url-found-for-submodule-path-public-in-gitmodules%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8github-page%e9%83%a8%e7%bd%b2%e5%a4%b1%e8%b4%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>使用Github page部署博客，push之后在仓库发生报错，GitHub部署失败，查看details：<code>Error: fatal: No url found for submodule path 'public' in .gitmodules</code>，发现是.gitmodules的错误。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114907288.png" alt="image-20241204114907255" srcset="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114907288.png?size=small, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114907288.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114907288.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20241204114907255" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114842512.png" alt="image-20241204114842445" srcset="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114842512.png?size=small, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114842512.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204114842512.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20241204114842445" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>查看本地的.gitmodules只有三行代码，且path和url都没有问题。并且本地没有任何跟public有关的.gitmodules，找遍了其他配置文件都没看到。在网上的解决方法是更新submudule，无效，报错。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule update</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>查看状态，依旧报错</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule status</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115642989.png" alt="image-20241204115642958" srcset="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115642989.png?size=small, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115642989.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115642989.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20241204115642958" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>最后参考：<a href="https://www.fordece.cn/posts/%e5%90%8c%e6%ad%a5%e5%ad%90%e6%a8%a1%e5%9d%97%e6%97%b6%e5%87%ba%e7%8e%b0gitmodules%e9%87%8c%e4%b8%8d%e5%ad%98%e5%9c%a8%e7%9a%84path/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">同步子模块时出现gitmodules里不存在的path - 某人的小栈</a>得已解决</p>
<p>是缓存的问题，原因：之前手动把.gitmodules的文件删了一部分，但是缓存没有更新。</p>
<p>解决方法：清楚缓存，有几个删几个。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ <span class="c1"># 把缓存里的public目录清理掉</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git rm --cached public</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115855913.png" alt="image-20241204115855875" srcset="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115855913.png?size=small, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115855913.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204115855913.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20241204115855875" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>即使如此，还是报错，这里怀疑是git的本地仓库一直有文件储藏了submodule的信息。尝试直接删除，强制推送。</p>
<p>在执行 <code>git add.</code> 操作时，发现自己忽略的warning可能是报错的原因：Git 检测到你正在将项目内的 <code>themes/hugo-theme-reimu</code> 和 <code>themes/hugo-theme-stack</code> 这两个本身是 <code>git</code> 仓库（也就是嵌入式 <code>git</code> 仓库）的目录添加进来。这意味着它们可能不是以正确的子模块形式存在于当前仓库中，而只是单纯作为嵌套的 <code>git</code> 仓库被添加，这样会导致一些潜在问题，比如克隆外层仓库时不会包含这些嵌入式仓库的内容，并且也不知道如何获取它们。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Administrator@DESKTOP-CADL72R MINGW64 /g/code/github/hugo-FixIt/my-blog <span class="o">(</span>main<span class="o">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ git add .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">warning: adding embedded git repository: themes/hugo-theme-reimu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: You<span class="err">&#39;</span>ve added another git repository inside your current repository.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: Clones of the outer repository will not contain the contents of
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: the embedded repository and will not know how to obtain it.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: If you meant to add a submodule, use:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: git submodule add &lt;url&gt; themes/hugo-theme-reimu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: If you added this path by mistake, you can remove it from the
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: index with:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: git rm --cached themes/hugo-theme-reimu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hint: See <span class="s2">&#34;git help submodule&#34;</span> <span class="k">for</span> more information.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">warning: adding embedded git repository: themes/hugo-theme-stack</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>而在github action的部署文件中也有一行：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">submodules: recursive # Fetch Hugo themes (true OR recursive)</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>在这里<code>recursive</code>表示递归地获取子模块。如果项目使用了 Hugo 主题（Hugo themes）并且这些主题是以子模块的形式包含在项目中的，这个设置就会将主题相关的子模块以及这些子模块可能依赖的其他更深层次的子模块（如果有的话）全部获取下来。</li>
</ul>
<p>**错误的原因：**我git拉取了好几个hugo的theme，但是只使用了一个，在action配置文件中有一个参数<code>recursive</code>表示递归地获取子模块，所以导致每次都会有文件外的submodule找不到url和path。</p>
<p>**解决方法：**删除这两个主题，并且清除子模块配置残留（本地）<strong>删除本地子模块目录（如果存在）</strong>：使用<code>rm -rf</code>命令删除本地仓库中对应的子模块目录。例如：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-plaintext" data-lang="plaintext"><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm -rf public
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm -rf themes/hugo - theme - reimu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm -rf themes/hugo - theme - stack</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li><strong>清除<code>Git</code>缓存中的子模块信息</strong>：执行以下命令来清除<code>Git</code>缓存中的子模块信息，这有助于确保<code>Git</code>不会再尝试使用已删除子模块的旧配置。</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-plaintext" data-lang="plaintext"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config - - remove - section submodule.public
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config - - remove - section submodule.themes/hugo - theme - reimu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config - - remove - section submodule.themes/hugo - theme - stack</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>使用<code>git push - - force</code>将修改后的历史记录推送到远程仓库。</p>
<p><strong>成功解决</strong></p>

item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203203116927.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="1配置自己的初始网站上传第一个博客" class="heading-element"><span>1.配置自己的初始网站，上传第一个博客。</span>
 <a href="#1%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e8%87%aa%e5%b7%b1%e7%9a%84%e5%88%9d%e5%a7%8b%e7%bd%91%e7%ab%99%e4%b8%8a%e4%bc%a0%e7%ac%ac%e4%b8%80%e4%b8%aa%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="11先决条件" class="heading-element"><span>1.1先决条件</span>
 <a href="#11%e5%85%88%e5%86%b3%e6%9d%a1%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在开始本教程之前，你必须：</p>
<ol>
<li><a href="https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">安装 Hugo</a>（扩展版，v0.134.1 或更高版本）</li>
<li><a href="https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-Installing-Git"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">安装 Git</a></li>
</ol>
<h2 id="12创建网站" class="heading-element"><span>1.2创建网站</span>
 <a href="#12%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba%e7%bd%91%e7%ab%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="121-命令" class="heading-element"><span>1.2.1 命令</span>
 <a href="#121-%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>验证你是否安装了 Hugo v0.134.1 或更高版本。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo version</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>运行以下命令来创建一个带有 <a href="https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">FixIt</a> 主题的 Hugo 网站。下一节将对每个命令进行解释。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new site my-blog
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> my-blog
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule add https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt.git themes/FixIt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="s2">&#34;theme = &#39;FixIt&#39;&#34;</span> &gt;&gt; hugo.toml

</h2><p><strong>为什么要搭建博客图床?</strong>
在本地的markdown文件.md中，图片是以“外链”这一形式存在的</p>
<p>Office word中，图片是直接插入docx文件里面
Markdown中，图片只是一个本地/联网的地址
也就是说，如果我们使用本地markdown编译器（如typora）来编辑MD文件的时候，如果MD里面插入的图片的源文件被移动或者删除了，我们的MD文档里面对应的图片也无法显示出来。</p>
<p>同时，如果我们用本地编辑器写好了一篇博客，想把它上传到CSDN上。CSDN是无法自动转存文件里面的图片的（因为这个图片只是一个你硬盘里面的文件路径）</p>
<p>[外链图片转存失败,源站可能有防盗链机制,建议将图片保存下来直接上传(img-0gNYdqHb-1647670910810)(photo/image-20220318140612548.png)]</p>
<p>这时候我们就需要用图床来解决这个问题</p>
<p><strong>什么是图床？</strong></p>
<p>在我们往typora里插入图片的时候，PicGO会自动上传图片到图床，并返回一个图片的链接</p>
<p>这时候你的图片就是一个网络的链接(网址)，不再是本地路径。</p>
<p>你也可以在任何有网络的地方、用任何设备访问这张图片了</p>
<p>即便是本地的那张图片移动or删除，也不会影响图床里的这张图片</p>
<p>markdown本地文件里面的图片也就不会失效了！</p>
<p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/muxuen/article/details/122441469"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Typora+PicGo+阿里云OSS搭建博客图床（超详细）-CSDN博客</a></p>

item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204092800261.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="paddleocr-介绍" class="heading-element"><span><strong>PaddleOCR 介绍</strong></span>
 <a href="#paddleocr-%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>这篇文章呢，将介绍一个新的 Github 项目，同样用于 OCR 识别、该项目名叫 PaddleOCR，是 Paddle 的一个分支；PaddleOCR 基于深度学习技术实现的， 所以使用时需要训练好的权重文件，但这个不需要我们担心，因为官方提供的有~</p>
<p>项目地址：<a href="https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleOCR"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">github链接</a></p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png" alt="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png" srcset="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png?size=small, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png?size=large 2x" data-title="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241203174630956.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>在 PaddleOCR 识别中，会依次完成三种任务：检测、方向分类及文本识别；</p>
<p>关于预训练权重，PaddleOCR 官网根据提供权重文件大小分为两类：</p>
<ul>
<li>一类为轻量级，（检测+分类+识别）三类权重加起来大小一共才 9.4 M，适用于手机端和服务器部署；</li>
<li>另一类（检测+分类+识别）三类权重内存加起来一共 143.4 MB ，适用于服务器部署；</li>
<li>无论模型是否轻量级，识别效果都能与商业效果相比，在本期教程中将选用轻量级权重用于测试；</li>
</ul>
<p>而且他还支持多语言识别，目前能够支持 80 多种语言；</p>
<ul>
<li>除了能对中文、英语、数字识别之外，还能应对字体倾斜、文本中含有小数点字符等复杂情况</li>
<li>提供有丰富的 OCR 领域相关工具供我们使用，方便我们制作自己的数据集、用于训练 半自动数据标注工具， 数据合成工具；</li>
</ul>
<p>想要体验可以在<a href="https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/hub/scene/ocr"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">体验网站</a>上传图片测试一下。</p>
<h2 id="快速上手" class="heading-element"><span><strong>快速上手</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e5%bf%ab%e9%80%9f%e4%b8%8a%e6%89%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

</h2><h3 id="安装" class="heading-element"><span><strong>安装</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>我并没有找到PaddleOCR集成的线上使用网站，如果要大规模使用，还是得配置在本地。PaddleOCR是paddle的一个分支。所以想要使用得先下好paddle库。按照下面的<a href="https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/install/quick?docurl=http://localhost:1313/documentation/docs/zh/install/pip/windows-pip.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">paddle技术文档</a>里面的安装部分操作。</p>
<p>我的环境是：</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Windows10，python3.9，cuda11.6。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>所以我的下载命令是：
<code>python -m pip install paddlepaddle-gpu==2.6.1.post116 -f https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/whl/windows/mkl/avx/stable.html</code></p>
<p>在下载的时候有时候会遇上有一些依赖包版本不对的情况，按照报错提示pip安装好依赖宝对应版本之后，重新执行下载命令即可</p>
<h3 id="命令行使用" class="heading-element"><span><strong>命令行使用</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4%e8%a1%8c%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>

支持命令行使用和python脚本使用。命令行操作看教程，简单说一下。

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">res</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">res</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">None</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">continue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">image</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">imgs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">scores</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">line</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">line</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">res</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">im_show</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">draw_ocr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">image</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">boxes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">txts</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scores</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">font_path</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;doc/fonts/simfang.ttf&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

</div>
</div><p>要使用滑动窗口进行光学字符识别（OCR），可以使用以下代码片段：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">from paddleocr import PaddleOCR
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 初始化OCR引擎
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ocr = PaddleOCR(use_angle_cls=True, lang=&#34;en&#34;)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">results = ocr.ocr(img_path, cls=True, slice=slice)

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> txt = line[1][0]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> draw.rectangle(box, outline=&#34;red&#34;, width=2) # 绘制矩形

item.title: 解决git连接失败的问题
item.author: 2446040095@qq.com (Goran)
item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204101301344.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="问题描述" class="heading-element"><span>问题描述</span>
 <a href="#%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98%e6%8f%8f%e8%bf%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在修改git代理后再运行git push -u origin master时出现如下问题：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git: Failed to connect to 127.0.0.1 port 1080: Connection refused</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="解决方法" class="heading-element"><span>解决方法</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a7%a3%e5%86%b3%e6%96%b9%e6%b3%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>网上有很多解决方法，但我在尝试的时候运行并没有反映。后来经过尝试后发现如何有效地利用这些方法解决这个问题。
网上方法：GitHub，解决访问时图裂、加载慢的问题</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global --unset http.proxy 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global --unset https.proxy</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这个我在终端运行时并没有反映，经尝试后我发现只有在git的仓库位置（初始化的位置）运行才会取消gitconfig中的http.proxy=127.0.0.1:1080或者https.proxy=127.0.0.1:1080。</p>
<p>我的Git初始化位置在总项目下的，前几次尝试都是在子目录git clone，于是我在主目录运行git config &ndash;list后果然发现存在代理问题（而你在其他位置运行就不会显示这个代理），最后只需要在你git对应的目录下运行以上方法即可成功解决。</p>

item.title: 解决hugo的一些小问题
item.author: 2446040095@qq.com (Goran)
item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204093453089.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="--简介introduction" class="heading-element"><span>- 简介(Introduction)：</span>
 <a href="#--%e7%ae%80%e4%bb%8bintroduction" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>布置hugo遇到的bug和问题，目前已实现功能：本地部署网站发布第一篇帖子，更改网站字体，更改网站宽度，部署到github page，使用github action自动部署。</p>
<h2 id="问题1配置文件的处理" class="heading-element"><span>问题1：配置文件的处理</span>
 <a href="#%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%981%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%9a%84%e5%a4%84%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>1.使用主题，不同的主题配置文件不同，需要做的就是不要找这么多教学，把官方文档看懂，跟着一个走就行。了解基础知识，比如说public文件夹是静态资源文件，原本里面是没有东西的，跑起来之后就有了，比如配置文件可以放在单独的文件夹也可以方法根目录下，但只能有一个，名字还可以不一样。
2.下载有很多方式，推荐直接github下载，然后主题里面的内容是可以不用去管的，文档让你下载哪些资源，创建哪些文件夹是在自己新建的空项目里面做。
3.不建议直接搬过来，但是可以试试，我没试过。</p>
<h2 id="问题2更改网站宽度" class="heading-element"><span>问题2：更改网站宽度</span>
 <a href="#%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%982%e6%9b%b4%e6%94%b9%e7%bd%91%e7%ab%99%e5%ae%bd%e5%ba%a6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>很多主题的宽度是按照hugo默认的，在读起来一句话很长看起来很难受。不知道大家选的主题是哪一个，这个设置一般是在assets的scss文件里面设置，我用的fixit主题可以支持自己在自己的assets文件夹下建立_override.scss文件，里面可以覆盖主题的样式，还有_custom.scss，fixit支持按照以下格式定义页面宽度。</p>
<p>// 自定义页面宽度
[data-page-style=&lsquo;custom&rsquo;] {
@media only screen and (min-width: 1441px) {
%page-style {
width: 720px; // 设置宽度为800像素
}
}</p>
<pre><code>@media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
 %page-style {
 width: 720px; // 设置宽度为800像素
 }
}
 
@media only screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
 %page-style {
 width: 100%; // 小屏幕时宽度100%
 }
}
</code></pre>
<p>}</p>
<h2 id="问题3更改网站字体" class="heading-element"><span>问题3：更改网站字体</span>
 <a href="#%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%983%e6%9b%b4%e6%94%b9%e7%bd%91%e7%ab%99%e5%ad%97%e4%bd%93" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>这里原本是按照主题的文档来写的，下载好了字体ttf文件，但是没有成功，遇到报错。</p>
<p>在_override.scss文件中自定义字体，然后将全局变量global-font-family修改，但是系统识别不了字体，读取不到，反复尝试多次不同的相对路径，确定不是路径问题。
//以My-Blog为根目录
@font-face {
font-family: xgw-wenkai;
src: url(&rsquo;../font/LXGWWenKaiGBScreen.ttf&rsquo;) format(&ldquo;ttf&rdquo;);
font-display: swap;
}
//以assets为根目录
@font-face {
font-family: yinbi2;
src: url(&rsquo;../font/正心格硬笔楷书简.ttf&rsquo;)format(&ldquo;ttf&rdquo;);
font-display: swap;
}
//以myblog（cmd下的目录）为根目录
@font-face {
font-family: yinbi1;
src: url(&rsquo;../font/瑞美加张清平硬笔楷书.ttf&rsquo;)format(&ldquo;ttf&rdquo;);
font-display: swap;
}
$global-font-family: &lsquo;LXGW WenKai&rsquo;, yinbi1, yinbi2, sans-serif!important;</p>
<p>后面也没找到原因，不过有另外一个方法，通过字体cdn网站成功解决，这个网站是线上配置字体资源，不需要本地下载，只需要引用就可以实现，非常方便。
@import url(&lsquo;<a href="https://chinese-fonts-cdn.deno.dev/packages/lxgwwenkai/dist/LXGWWenKai-Regular/result.css%27%29;"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://chinese-fonts-cdn.deno.dev/packages/lxgwwenkai/dist/LXGWWenKai-Regular/result.css');</a>
$global-font-family: &lsquo;LXGW WenKai&rsquo;, yinbi1, yinbi2, sans-serif!important;
检查方式：可以打开网站，使用F12检查网络，网络刷新一下看是否有自己设定的字体刷出来。</p>

在写markdown文档过程中遇到了github图床展示图片破损的问题。原因：dns污染，解决方法：修改host文件。网上找到两种方法，第一种手动改，这里推荐第二种自动更改。<code>SwitchHosts</code>是一个用于快速切换<code>hosts</code>文件的开源软件（https://github.com/oldj/SwitchHosts ）</p>
<p>下载后直接正常安装，接着以<strong>管理员身份</strong>打开，点击左下角<code>+</code>新建<code>hosts</code>，以 SwitchHosts 为例，看一下怎么使用的，配置参考下面：</p>
<ul>
<li>Hosts 类型: <code>Remote</code></li>
<li>Hosts 标题: 随意</li>
<li>URL: <code>https://raw.hellogithub.com/hosts</code></li>
<li>自动刷新: 最好选 <code>1 小时</code>这样每隔一小时</li>
</ul>
<p><code>SwitchHosts</code>就会自动访问URL并更新<code>hosts</code>信息：

item.title: 我的第一个博客：使用Github的小技巧
item.author: 2446040095@qq.com (Goran)
item.description:
<img src="https://gorantan-blog.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/pic/20241204093206748.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>简介：本文分享我作为新手的一些github的使用技巧，分别是如何快速的访问github，如何不进入github实现加速github项目的下载和clone，以及github的项目文档书写规范。</p>
<h2 id="1如何快速的访问github" class="heading-element"><span>1.如何快速的访问github</span>
 <a href="#1%e5%a6%82%e4%bd%95%e5%bf%ab%e9%80%9f%e7%9a%84%e8%ae%bf%e9%97%aegithub" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>内容：本人实测的可行的加速github方法，网上发布的很多方法经过测试已经无法使用，比如修改host地址，目前是2024年10月30日，以下方法仍然可用。</p>
<h2 id="11-下载使用steam" class="heading-element"><span>1.1. 下载使用steam++</span>
 <a href="#11-%e4%b8%8b%e8%bd%bd%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8steam" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>这个方法本人并未使用，但是在搜索时在2024年有多条评论显示steam++可以实现github加速。</p>
<h2 id="12-下载devsidecar" class="heading-element"><span>1.2. 下载devsidecar</span>
 <a href="#12-%e4%b8%8b%e8%bd%bddevsidecar" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>devsidecar是一个github的开源项目，可以实现：dns优选，请求拦截，github直连加速，npm加速，Stack Overflow加速。</p>
<p>项目路径：<a href="https://github.com/docmirror/dev-sidecar"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">docmirror/dev-sidecar: 开发者边车，github打不开，github加速，git clone加速，git release下载加速，stackoverflow加速</a></p>
<p>下载路径：<a href="https://github.com/docmirror/dev-sidecar/releases"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Releases · docmirror/dev-sidecar</a></p>
<p>使用方法：按照教程下载安装之后，在首页打开默认模式。如果打不开github连接，可以复制下载链接在下面介绍的加速下载网站打开。</p>
<center><figure><img src="../assets/app1.png" width="100%"><figcaption>
 <h4>软件图片</h4>
 </figcaption>
</figure>
</center>
<h2 id="2如何加速github的下载和clone" class="heading-element"><span>2.如何加速github的下载和clone</span>
 <a href="#2%e5%a6%82%e4%bd%95%e5%8a%a0%e9%80%9fgithub%e7%9a%84%e4%b8%8b%e8%bd%bd%e5%92%8cclone" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>大家经常可以遇到clone速度以kb/s甚至b/s计数，在网上找到一个好用的方法，有两个网站，可以把要clone的网址复制下来，粘贴到网站里，第一个网站速度接近1mb，第二个网站可以达到2到4mb，这个也和网络有关。</p>
<p><a href="https://github.moeyy.xyz/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">GitHub加速下载</a>
<a href="https://gh.api.99988866.xyz/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">GitHub 文件加速</a></p>
<h2 id="3如何培养好的文档编写习惯" class="heading-element"><span>3.如何培养好的文档编写习惯</span>
 <a href="#3%e5%a6%82%e4%bd%95%e5%9f%b9%e5%85%bb%e5%a5%bd%e7%9a%84%e6%96%87%e6%a1%a3%e7%bc%96%e5%86%99%e4%b9%a0%e6%83%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>从一个github大佬那里参考过来的，有点忘记名字了，一个好的文档编写习惯对于小白来说还是挺重要的。</p>
<p>软件手册是一部完整的书，建议采用下面的结构。</p>
<ul>
<li>简介(Introduction)：[必备][文件]提供对产品和文档本身的总体的、扼要的说明。</li>
<li>快速上手(Getting Started)：[可选][文件]如何最快速地使用产品。</li>
<li>入门篇(Basics)：[必备][目录]又称“使用篇”，提供初级的使用教程。
<ul>
<li>环境准备(Prerequisite)：[必备][文件]软件使用需要满足的前置条件。</li>
<li>安装(Installation)：[可选][文件]软件的安装方法。</li>
<li>设置(Configuration)：[必备][文件]软件的设置。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>进阶篇(Advanced)：[可选][目录]又称“开发篇”。提供中高级的开发教程。
<ul>
<li>API(Reference)：[可选][目录/文件]软件 API 的逐一介绍。</li>
<li>FAQ：[可选][文件]常见问题解答。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>附录(Appendix)：[可选][目录]不属于教程本身、但对阅读教程有帮助的内容。
<ul>
<li>Glossary：[可选][文件]名词解释。</li>
<li>Recipes：[可选][文件]最佳实践。</li>
<li>Troubleshooting：[可选][文件]故障处理。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>ChangeLog：[可选][文件]版本说明。</li>
<li>Feedback：[可选][文件]反馈方式。</li>
</ul>
<!-- 采用 HTML 标签的方法来插入图片

<center><img src="../assets/content.png" width="50%" /></center> -->
<!-- Hugo 官方提供了一些 shortcodes 短代码，其中就包含插入图片的短代码 figure
<center><figure><img src="../assets/content.png" width="50%"><figcaption>
 <h4>这是一个测试图片，位于assets文件夹下</h4>
 </figcaption>
</figure>
</center> -->
<center><figure><img src="../assets/content.png" width="100%"><figcaption>
